faq.title: What is unique / and non unique purchase ?
faq.desc: Non-exclusive purchase means that other people can buy the template you have chosen some time later. Exclusive or unique purchase guarantees that you are the last person to buy this template. After an exclusive purchase occurs the template is being permanently removed from the sales directory and will never be available to other customers again. Only you and people who bought the template before you will own it.

faqAccordion.question: What are advantages working with us?
faqAccordion.answer: We offer fast service, best solutions, support for new ideas and close cooperation throughout the project development.

faqAccordion.question: How can i pay my order?
faqAccordion.answer: You will pay through banks, we will send you the payment slip with pdf file with all the necessary information
